attributes.action: Make Warm Homes Discount Available to customers of all Energy Providers
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government currently only operates the Warm Homes Discount Scheme in conjunction with only the largest of home energy providers.  This can prevent vulnerable home owners and tenants from accessing the energy deals cheapest and best for them.

In these austere times, please maximise the benefit of the Warm Homes Discount available to vulnerable energy customers by changing this system.
